headline: Dr Pepper Marks 18 Years of Impact with the Announcement of the 2025 Dr Pepper Tuition Giveaway Winners
summary: Dr Pepper®, part of the Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ: KDP) portfolio of brands, has announced the winners of the 18th annual Dr Pepper Tuition Giveaway, awarding three students each $100,000 in tuition funds during the three College Football Conference Championship games (SEC, Big Ten, ACC) on Saturday, December 6th. Six finalists participated in the Dr Pepper Tuition Giveaway where they competed against a peer to see who could throw the most footballs into an oversized Dr Pepper can in 30 seconds.

Six finalists participated in the Dr Pepper Tuition Giveaway where they competed against a peer to see who could throw the most footballs into an oversized Dr Pepper can in 30 seconds.

thumbnail.caption: Francis P. winning the Dr Pepper Tuition Toss during halftime at the 2025 Big Ten Championship
